# libraryType

**Instance Property**

The kind of library to create.

## Declaration

```swift
var libraryType: MTLLibraryType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLLibraryType/executable].

## Configuring the library output options

- **installName**: For a dynamic library, the name to use when installing the library.
